title: Paloma: Thyroid Hormone Health
description:
Millions of Americans currently live with hypothyroidism and Hashimoto’s disease (an autoimmune condition that is the leading cause of hypothyroidism). Paloma Health is the first-of-its-kind platform offering thyroid patients a holistic approach to thyroid health and wellness. 

Take back control of your thyroid health with at-home testing, virtual consultations with thyroid experts, and evidence-based interventions to improve thyroid function and reduce thyroid-related symptoms.

What you get: 

STEP-BY-STEP DIET PLAN
Access a free 12-week diet plan to reduce inflammation and alleviate thyroid symptoms through the autoimmune protocol (AIP diet)

INTERACTIVE LEARNING MODULES
Over 75 self-paced, evidence-based learning modules to better understand your thyroid condition and how to manage symptoms and thyroid-healthy lifestyle

THYROID TESTING
Order your at-home thyroid test kit and monitor your thyroid lab results (TSH, free T3, free T4, TPO antibodies) directly in the app to track how your thyroid levels change over time

DOCTOR AND NUTRITIONIST CONSULTATIONS
Connect with knowledgeable thyroid doctors and nutritionists to find the treatment and support you need to accelerate your thyroid healing journey

CARE MANAGER SUPPORT
Enjoy in-app messaging with your Paloma Health Care Manager—anytime, anywhere

PEER TALK & SUPPORT
Access the free Paloma Health community from the app to connect with other thyroid patients, get your Qs answered by thyroid experts, and unlock educational resources

SYMPTOM TRACKER
Track energy, mood, pain, and other thyroid symptoms to see how they change throughout the program

LIBRARY OF AIP RECIPES
Library of healthy recipes from your favorite thyroid health coaches and nutritionists, ranging in difficulty to keep you inspired and motivated in the kitchen

ARTICLE DATABASE
Over 200 blog posts and articles to supplement your learning about overall thyroid health

THYROID MEDICATION REMINDERS
Set automated notifications to get reminders and recommendations for how and when to take your thyroid medications

CONNECT WITH US

Please send your questions, suggestions, and feedback to contact@palomahealth.com.

Website: www.palomahealth.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/groups/palomahealth
Instagram: instagram.com/palomahealth

MEDICAL DISCLAIMER

This app is intended for informational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Please seek the advice of your doctor in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions.
